abstract: Motorola is preparing for a second showdown with the activist investor Carl C. Icahn, who has increased his stake in the company ahead of a May battle over board seats.
lead_paragraph: Motorola is preparing for a second showdown with the activist investor Carl C. Icahn, who has increased his stake in the company ahead of a May battle over board seats.

headline.main: Motorola and Icahn Gird for Second Round
